title: The unit of exit width use to measure the capacity of any exit should be 50 cm
clause_text: The unit of exit width use to measure the capacity of any exit should be 50 cm. A clear width of 25 cm. should be counted as additional half unit. Clear width less than 25 cm. should not be computed for exit width. Occupants per unit exit width shall be in accordance with Table No.9-F

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
